attributes.action: Officialy recognise in some form the town of Wootton Bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Wootton Bassett in Wiltshire turn out constantly and selflessly to honour the servicemen and women who gave their lives in Iraq and Afghanistan and should be recognised by the Government for this meaningful act.
It would be nice to see some sort of meaningful recognition and not just a line spoken in Parliament. A lot of people in the country are proud of what the town is doing and would like to see the Government recognise it too.
